Articles.Content: Ok, imagine that you have this plane about the size of a B-52 in KSP. You start takeoff and you reach the end of the runway before you build enough lift. And you know the rest. What I think that KSP needs next is a runway that runs from 2 meters away from the monolith ending 4 meters from the water to 5 meters away from the hills. The runway will be added when a player in science or career mode levels up the main runway to level 2. the Runway will need to be slightly wider than the main runway for space/aircraft that can't fit or for launching 4 or more fighter sized aircraft.
That could be cool. Of course, this being KSP, I'd simply advice you to use rocket assisted takeoff because, you know, moar boosters.
